}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *Model Number: AP6275S • BCM43752 • WFA [https://api.cert.wi-fi.org/api/certificate/download/public?variantId=103641 Sertified] (2021-06-21) :Product Name: [[Synaptics]] (?) BCM43752 Wi-Fi 6 Dual Band Single-Chip
*[https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan811/ ''SparkLAN AP6275S'' module on '''EmbeddedWorks''']
===Product Key Features=== * Chipset: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-bluetooth/bcm4375 BCM4375] (BCM43752) * Supports 2×2 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax WLAN standards * Single-die WLAN and Bluetooth combination solution * TX and RX low-density parity check (LDPC) support : for improved range and power efficiency * Real simultaneous Dual-Band, Supports MU-MIMO * Dual-stream spatial multiplexing up to 1200 Mbps data rate * Supports Bluetooth 5.0 including Low-Energy Long Range (LE/LR) * Supports 20/40MHz at 2.4GHz and 20/40/80MHz at 5GHz : with optional SGI (1024QAM modulation) * Frequency Range: 2.400~2.4835 GHz, 5.150~5.850 GHz * Interface: WLAN: SDIO 3.0/2.0, Bluetooth: UART/PCM * Interface Connector: WLAN: SDIO/SPI/HSIC, Bluetooth/FM: UART * Form Factor: SiP LGA Type, Dimensions: 15 × 13 × 1.5 mm
==Pictures== <center> <gallery> File:AP6275S.jpg| File:AP6275S-Block-Diagram-.jpg| File:AP6275S-Pin-Definition.jpg| </gallery></center>
==See also== :;[[AMPAK]] • [[Broadcom]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] ([[QCA]]) *[[AMPAK AP6181]] - 1T1R (Wi-Fi 4) • [[Broadcom]] BCM43362 :802.11bgn Wi-Fi SiP Module • [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan801/ Spec. on EW] *[[AMPAK AP6212SD]] - 1T1R (Wi-Fi 4) • [[Broadcom]] BCM43438 :802.11bgn Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.1 (M.2 LGA Type 1216) Module • [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan814/ EW] *[[AMPAK AP6256]] - 1T1R (Wi-Fi 5) • [[Broadcom]] BCM43456 :802.11abgn/ac Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.0 Combo SiP Module • [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan803/ EW] *'''[[AMPAK AP6275S]]''' - 2T2R ('''Wi-Fi 6''') • [[Broadcom]] BCM43752 :802.11abgn/ac/ax Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.0 Combo SiP Module :WLAN: SDIO / SPI / HSIC; Bluetooth / FM: UART • [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan811/ EW] :• AP6275SDPR ([https://www.embeddedworks.net/products/wlan/wlan867/ EW]) • AP6275SDSR ([https://www.embeddedworks.net/products/wlan/wlan868/ EW]) • AP6275P ([https://www.embeddedworks.net/products/wlan/wlan867/ EW]) *[[AMPAK AP6345SD]] - 1T1R (Wi-Fi 5) • [[Broadcom]] BCM43456 :802.11abgn/ac Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.0 (M.2 LGA Type 1216) Module • [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan813/ EW] *[[AMPAK AP6356SDPB]] - 2T2R (Wi-Fi 5) • [[Broadcom]] BCM4356A2 :802.11abgn/ac Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.1 (M.2 LGA Type 1216) Module :WLAN: PCIe for Wi-Fi, UART/USB/PCM interface for Bluetooth • [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan816/ EW] *[[AMPAK AP6398S]] - 2T2R (Wi-Fi 5) • [[Broadcom]] BCM43598 :802.11abgn/ac Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.0 Combo SiP Module • [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan805/ EW] *[[AMPAK AP6738SD]] - 1T1R (Wi-Fi 4) • [[Broadcom]] BCM43438A1 :802.11bgn Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.1 (M.2 LGA Type 1216) Module • [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan813/ EW]
===Models=== :;[[SparkLAN]] • [https://www.sparklan.com/product/ SiP Module Series] • [http://www.plyworks.co.kr/pw_assets/down/WIFI_Module_LIST_2018.pdf Wi-Fi Module List (2018)]
*[[SparkLAN AP6275S]] - '''WiFi 6''' + BT 5.0, 802.11ax/ac SiP Module, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN AP6275P]] - '''WiFi 6''' + BT 5.0, 802.11ax/ac Sip Module, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN AP6275HH3]] - '''WiFi 6''' + BT 5.0, 802.11ax/ac SiP Module, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN AP6256]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, 802.11ac SiP Module, 1T1R *[[SparkLAN AP6345SD]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, 802.11ac M.2 LGA 1216 Module, 1T1R *[[SparkLAN AP6398S]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, 802.11ac SiP Module, 2T2R
*[[SparkLAN WPET-236ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 4.2, RTL8822BU, 802.11ac Half Size Mini PCIe, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WUBT-236ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 4.2, RTL8822BU, 802.11ac USB, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WNFT-237ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, RTL8822CE, 802.11ac M.2 A/E Key 2230, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WNFT-238AX(BT)]] - '''WiFi 6''' + BT 5.2, 802.11ax/ac M.2 2230 (A/E Key), 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WUBT-239ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, RTL8822CU, 802.11ac USB Dongle, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WPET-239ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, RTL8822CU, 802.11ac Half Size Mini PCIe, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WPEA-251ACNI(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, QCA6174A, 802.11ac Half Size Mini PCIe, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WPEQ-256ACN]] - WiFi 5, QCA9882, 802.11ac Full Size Mini PCIe, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WPEQ-256ACNRBI]] - WiFi 5, QCA9892, 802.11ac Full Size Mini PCIe, 2T2R, Industrial *[[SparkLAN WNFQ-258ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, QCA6174A, 802.11ac M.2 A/E Key 2230, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WPEQ-261ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, QCA6174A, 802.11ac Half Size Mini PCIe, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WPEQ-261ACNI(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, QCA6174A, 802.11ac Half Size Mini PCIe, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WNFQ-262ACNI(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, QCA6174A, 802.11ac M.2 B Key 2242, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WPEQ-268AXI(BT)]] - '''WiFi 6''' + BT 5.2, 802.11ax/ac Half Size Mini PCIe, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WNFQ-268AXI(BT)]] - '''WiFi 6''' + BT 5.2, 802.11ax/ac M.2 2230 (E Key), 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WPEA-352ACNRB]] - WiFi 5, QCA9880, 802.11ac Full Size Mini PCIe, 3T3R *[[SparkLAN WPEA-352ACNRBI]] - WiFi 5, QCA9890, 802.11ac Full Size Mini PCIe, 3T3R, Industrial *[[SparkLAN WPEQ-450AC]] - WiFi 5, QCA9984, 802.11ac/an (5GHz) Full Size Mini PCIe, 4T4R *[[SparkLAN WPEQ-405AX]] - '''WiFi 6''', QCN9074, 802.11ax/ac/an (5GHz) Full Size Mini PCIe, 4T4R
